title: General availability: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server data encryption with CMK
summary: Encrypt your data with customer-managed keys to enable an extra layer of security for data at rest.

title: Generally available: Updated API names for Azure Cosmos DB
summary: See multiple updated API names in Azure Cosmos DB on product pages, in technical documentation, and billing that will not impact your experience, product functionality, or performance.

title: General availability: Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL now available in new regions
summary: Create Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL clusters now in the Sweden Central and Switzerland West regions.

title: Public Preview: Materialized view for Azure Cosmos DB for Apache Cassandra
summary: Experience even greater compatibility for native Apache Cassandra with materialized view.

title: General availability: JSON support in Azure Cache for Redis Enterprise tiers
summary: Gain powerful tools for working with JSON formatted data in Azure Cache for Redis through the RedisJSON module.

title: Generally Available: Azure Functions support for Java 17
summary: You can now use the latest LTS version of Java with Azure Functions.

title: Azure SQLâ€”General availability updates for mid-December 2022
summary: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-December 2022.

title: Community support for Azure Functions Proxies will end on 30 September 2025
summary: Transition to Azure API Management as soon as possible to avoid disruption to your Function applications using Proxies.
